Toledo.Orthodox Church in America Bulgarian Dio: The Orthodox Church in America Bulgarian Diocese is one of three ethnic dioceses of the Orthodox Church in America (OCA). Its territory includes parishes, monasteries, and missions located in six states in the United States, as well as one province in Canada – California, Illinois, Indiana, Kansas, Michigan, Ohio, Ontario, and Washington, D.C. The former Archbishop of the Bulgarian Diocese was the Most Reverend Kyrill (Yonchev), who also served as the Archbishop of Pittsburgh and Western Pennsylvania. Since his repose on June 17, 2007, however, Metropolitan Herman serves as locum tenens of the diocese, pending the election and installation of a new bishop for the diocese.
